verses.name: Acts 27:16
verses.text: And running under a certain island which is called Clauda, we had much work to come by the boat:

verses.name: Acts 27:17
verses.text: Which when they had taken up, they used helps, undergirding the ship; and, fearing lest they should fall into the quicksands, strake sail, and so were driven.

verses.name: Acts 27:18
verses.text: And we being exceedingly tossed with a tempest, the next day they lightened the ship;

verses.name: Acts 27:19
verses.text: And the third day we cast out with our own hands the tackling of the ship.
